title: Facebook collected device data on 187,000 users using banned snooping app
text: Facebook obtained personal and sensitive device data on about 187,000 users of its now-defunct Research app, which Apple banned earlier this year after the app violated its rules. title: The Recent Decline of Facebook Stock Was a Great Buying Opportunity
text:
FB has already recovered its losses from the antitrust probe announcement, showing that investors widely see these probes as a time to buy FB stock.
